verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, when all these things<WH1697> are come<WH935> upon thee, the blessing<WH1293> and the curse<WH7045>, which I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> thee, and thou shalt call<WH7725> them to mind<WH3824> among all the nations<WH1471>, whither the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath driven<WH5080> thee,

And shalt return<WH7725> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and shalt obey<WH8085> his voice<WH6963> according to all that I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, thou and thy children<WH1121>, with all thine heart<WH3824>, and with all thy soul<WH5315>;

That then the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will turn<WH7725> thy captivity<WH7622>, and have compassion<WH7355> upon thee, and will return<WH7725> and gather<WH6908> thee from all the nations<WH5971>, whither the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath scattered<WH6327> thee.

If any of thine be driven out<WH5080> unto the outmost<WH7097> parts of heaven<WH8064>, from thence will the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> gather<WH6908> thee, and from thence will he fetch<WH3947> thee:

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will bring<WH935> thee into the land<WH776> which thy fathers<WH1> possessed<WH3423>, and thou shalt possess<WH3423> it; and he will do thee good<WH3190>, and multiply<WH7235> thee above thy fathers<WH1>.

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will circumcise<WH4135> thine heart<WH3824>, and the heart<WH3824> of thy seed<WH2233>, to love<WH157> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with all thine heart<WH3824>, and with all thy soul<WH5315>, that thou mayest live<WH2416>.
And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will put<WH5414> all these curses<WH423> upon thine enemies<WH341>, and on them that hate<WH8130> thee, which persecuted<WH7291> thee.
And thou shalt return<WH7725> and obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068>, and do<WH6213> all his commandments<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>.

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will make thee plenteous<WH3498> in every work<WH4639> of thine hand<WH3027>, in the fruit<WH6529> of thy body<WH990>, and in the fruit<WH6529> of thy cattle<WH929>, and in the fruit<WH6529> of thy land<WH127>, for good<WH2896>: for the LORD<WH3068> will again<WH7725> rejoice<WH7797> over thee for good<WH2896>, as he rejoiced<WH7797> over thy fathers<WH1>:

If thou shalt hearken<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which are written<WH3789> in this book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451>, and if thou turn<WH7725> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with all thine heart<WH3824>, and with all thy soul<WH5315>.
¶ For this commandment<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, it is not hidden<WH6381> from thee, neither is it far off<WH7350>.
It is not in heaven<WH8064>, that thou shouldest say<WH559>, Who shall go up<WH5927> for us to heaven<WH8064>, and bring<WH3947> it unto us, that we may hear<WH8085> it, and do<WH6213> it?

Neither is it beyond<WH5676> the sea<WH3220>, that thou shouldest say<WH559>, Who shall go<WH5674> over<WH5676> the sea<WH3220> for us, and bring<WH3947> it unto us, that we may hear<WH8085> it, and do<WH6213> it?
But the word<WH1697> is very<WH3966> nigh<WH7138> unto thee, in thy mouth<WH6310>, and in thy heart<WH3824>, that thou mayest do<WH6213> it.
¶ See<WH7200>, I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> thee this day<WH3117> life<WH2416> and good<WH2896>, and death<WH4194> and evil<WH7451>;

In that I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117> to love<WH157> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, to walk<WH3212> in his ways<WH1870>, and to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> and his judgments<WH4941>, that thou mayest live<WH2421> and multiply<WH7235>: and the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bless<WH1288> thee in the land<WH776> whither thou goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.
But if thine heart<WH3824> turn away<WH6437>, so that thou wilt not hear<WH8085>, but shalt be drawn away<WH5080>, and worship<WH7812> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and serve<WH5647> them;

I denounce<WH5046> unto you this day<WH3117>, that ye shall surely<WH6> perish<WH6>, and that ye shall not prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> upon the land<WH127>, whither thou passest over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> to go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

I call<WH5749> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to record<WH5749> this day<WH3117> against you, that I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you life<WH2416> and death<WH4194>, blessing<WH1293> and cursing<WH7045>: therefore choose<WH977> life<WH2416>, that both thou and thy seed<WH2233> may live<WH2421>:

That thou mayest love<WH157> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and that thou mayest obey<WH8085> his voice<WH6963>, and that thou mayest cleave<WH1692> unto him: for he is thy life<WH2416>, and the length<WH753> of thy days<WH3117>: that thou mayest dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH127> which the LORD<WH3068> sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1>, to Abraham<WH85>, to Isaac<WH3327>, and to Jacob<WH3290>, to give<WH5414> them.
